properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 3:08PM EST until January 22 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
5 to 8 ft.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM and Savannah to
Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY
